extendedIngredients.name: chocolate chips
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup chopped chocolate chips (I used Ghirardelli)

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
peanut butter
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup peanut butter (I use Adam's crunchy)

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Grape-Nuts Truffles
recipes.instructions: Place all ingredients in a food processing or chopper and blend until thoroughly mixed.Scoop into 1" dough balls and place on a cookie sheet lined with parchment paper or a Silpat mat.Freeze until very firm - several hours to overnight.Melt dark chocolate and dip each dough ball until completely covered, carefully tapping off excess chocolate.  Place on prepared cookie sheet and chill in the refrigerator until chocolate is set - approximately 10 minutes.Enjoy! :)

steps.step: Place all ingredients in a food processing or chopper and blend until thoroughly mixed.Scoop into 1" dough balls and place on a cookie sheet lined with parchment paper or a Silpat mat.Freeze until very firm - several hours to overnight.Melt dark chocolate and dip each dough ball until completely covered, carefully tapping off excess chocolate.
Place on prepared cookie sheet and chill in the refrigerator until chocolate is set - approximately 10 minutes.Enjoy! :)
